title: Martin Roumagnac = the Room Upstairs
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Pierre-Rene Wolf.
description: Martin, a builder in a dusty French provincial town, is hired to construct a house for Blanche, a sophisticated, cosmopolitan newcomer to the district. They have a passionate affair until he discovers that she is a high-class whore, whereupon he kills her and is tried for murder. Reference: Bloomsbury Foreign Film Guide.  Credits: Producer, Marc Le Pelletier ; director, Georges Lacombe ; writers, Georges Lacombe, Pierre Very ; photography, Roger Hubert ; music, Marcel Mirouze ; art director, Georges Wakhevitch. Cast: Marlene Dietrich, Jean Gabin, Margo Lion, Lucien Nat, Daniel Gelin.
